name: Ninja Race
description:
This is a 2D platform game where you play a cube that is actually a ninja. There is a stopwatch to see how long you take to finish the game.

The goal is to finish the game as quickly as possible in order to make a good score.

Gameplay's keys and explanations :

- Right arrow key to go to the right and left arrow key to go to the left.

- Up arrow key to jump and press back and forth to double jump.

- Click with the computer mouse to throw shuriken (head the character to the left to throw shuriken to the left and to the right to throw shuriken to the right).

- In the game there are two types of turret, the ones that you can destroy with shuriken and the ones that are plugged into an electrical station (throw a shuriken to turn off this turret for a few second).
